name: avg_over_time
description: Calculates the average over time of a numeric field.

params.name: number
params.description: Expression that outputs values to average.

params.name: window
params.description: the time window over which to compute the average

params.name: window

params.name: number
params.description: Expression that outputs values to average.

params.name: window
params.description: the time window over which to compute the average

examples:
TS k8s
| STATS max_cost=MAX(AVG_OVER_TIME(network.cost)) BY cluster, time_bucket = TBUCKET(1minute)

TS k8s
| STATS events = sum(avg_over_time(events_received, 10minute)) by pod, time_bucket = tbucket(5minute)
